data.message: Ice is used as a numbing agent called c-ban c- cold b- burning a- aching n- numb. In used in different ways & application's to the body or body parts up to 20 mins. Max ii is the equivalent to a 60mg morphine shot. In a bath like that his whole body is numb of all pain. It takes extreme control & meditation as you can see he is doing great, to be able to complete the exercise. Believe me it's WELL WORTH IT! LICENSE THERAPEUTIC MASSAGE THERAPIST: FLORIDA COLLEGE OF NATURAL HEALTH. NO HAPPY ENDINGS!!!!
